Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute near 75th/Perry
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses temp. rerouted EB: 75th, Vincennes, 76th, and Lafayette; WB: State,76th, Vincennes, and 75th due to, street blockage near 75th/Perry.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 75th/Perry, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 75th, Vincennes, 76th, and Lafayette.

Westbound buses will operate via State,76th, Vincennes, and 75th.

Allow extra travel time.
